content: you are welcome to sell the finished product however you may not sell publish reproduce distribute or modify any part of this pattern do not claim it as your own this pattern is written using us terminology and is worked in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated i recommend that you always mark the beginning of each round with a stitch marker basic crochet skills are required materials hook size c / 2 50mm yarn cotton 3 5oz/100g 273yd/250m stitch marker scissor sewing needle stuffing glue small crafts pompoms if made with the described materials the bag will be about 20cm / 8 inches tall 19cm / 7 5 inches width however it may vary depending on the type of yarn and hook size used you can also use any color yarn you like feel free to add accessories to create your very own christmas bag
